mapper.update:
update si_forklift
forklift_no = #{forkliftNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
forklift_model = #{forkliftModel,jdbcType=CHAR},
forklift_brand = #{forkliftBrand,jdbcType=CHAR},
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
imei_no = #{imeiNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
work_area = #{workArea,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where forklift_id = #{forkliftId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update si_forklift set forklift_no = #{forkliftNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, forklift_model = #{forkliftModel,jdbcType=CHAR}, forklift_brand = #{forkliftBrand,jdbcType=CHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, imei_no = #{imeiNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, work_area = #{workArea,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where forklift_id = #{forkliftId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
